name: Ram
desc: Ram yourself into your opponent

name: Telekinesis
desc: You slam a rock into your opponent

name: Fireball
desc: Launches a ball of fire

name: Earthquake
desc: Hits everyone

name: Laser
desc: Repeatedly attack the opponent

name: Scratch
desc: Do very minor damage

name: Snowball
desc: Launches a few snowballs. May cause frost or blindness.

name: Lightning Strike
desc: Has a chance to shock the enemy.

name: Wide Slash
desc: Performs a sweeping attack, targetting two other characters

name: Poison Slash
desc: Poisons the enemy upon hit

name: Pass turn
desc: Allows the user to skip their turn

name: Ground Suction
desc: Pulls the user into the ground, cutting them on the rocks and they bleed out over time

name: Counter
desc: counter the next attack that comes

name: Warning
desc: The user will be warned not to break your shield

name: Witch spell
desc: When attacked, cast a curse on whoever attacked you

name: Illusion spell
desc: Create an illusion that retaliates when attacked

name: First aid
desc: Heal oneself upon hit

name: Summon Squirrel
desc: Summon a small squirrel to help you

name: Summon Golem
desc: Summon a crystal to help you

name: Heal pulse
desc: boosts defense for x amount of time

name: Spore
desc: Gives the opponent an infection

name: Protect
desc: protects the user from any hit

name: burn up
desc: The target will burn up for a short amount of time

name: Counterstrike
desc: Adds a lot of shield

name: attack up
desc: boosts damage for x amount of time

name: defense up
desc: boosts defense for x amount of time

name: flare up
desc: Makes the user charge up their attacks

name: Poison
desc: Will poison the person targeted

name: Sacrifice
desc: Injures the user to cause more damage later

name: Defensive Stance
desc: The user decides to be cautious for some time

name: Construct
desc: The user starts to build up their stats

name: Stun Spore
desc: Paralyze the target, preventing them from doing anything

name: Invigorate
desc: Energize the target, allowing them to make more moves per turn

name: Pray
desc: cleanse oneself of all effects
